metadata.title: CVE-2024-28820 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the extract_openvpn_cr function in openvpn-cr.c inopenvpn-auth-ldap (aka the Three Rings Auth-LDAP plugin for OpenVPN) 2.0.4allows attackers with a valid LDAP username and who can control thechallenge/response password field to pass a string with more than 14 colonsinto this field and cause a buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: openvpn-auth-ldap package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
